itinerary.mapNote: Easy first day through beech forest along Clinton River. 150m.
At foot of Mackinnon Pass. Dramatic cirque valley. 580m.
Trail end. Ferry to Milford Sound. 0m.

waypoints.name: Mackinnon Pass
waypoints.note: Route highpoint and finest viewpoint. Memorial cairn at top.

waypoints.name: Sutherland Falls
waypoints.note: 580m drop — one of world's tallest waterfalls. 20min detour.

waypoints.name: Clinton Canyon
waypoints.note: Glacier-carved U-shaped valley. Textbook glacial geology.

waypoints.name: Milford Sound
waypoints.note: Fiord destination. Mitre Peak 1692m. Cruise departure.

waypoints.name: Lake Te Anau
waypoints.note: Gateway lake. Longest in South Island. Glowworm caves nearby.
